verses.verse: In you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> do I put my <S%H2620>trust:<s%> let me <S%H408>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be put to <S%H954>confusion.<s%>
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me in your <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and cause me to <S%H6403>escape:<s%> <S%H5186>incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to me, and <S%H3467>save<s%> me.

Be you my <S%H6697>strong<s%> <S%H4583>habitation,<s%> whereunto I may <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H935>resort:<s%> you have given <S%H6680>commandment<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> me; for you are my <S%H5553>rock<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress.<s%>
<S%H6403>Deliver<s%> me, O my <S%H430>God,<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H5765>unrighteous<s%> and <S%H2556>cruel<s%> man.
For you are my <S%H8615>hope,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD:<s%> you are my <S%H4009>trust<s%> from my <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

By you have I been <S%H5564>held<s%> up from the <S%H990>womb:<s%> you are he that <S%H1491>took<s%> me out of my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H4578>bowels:<s%> my <S%H8416>praise<s%> shall be <S%H8548>continually<s%> of you.
I am as a <S%H4159>wonder<s%> to <S%H7227>many;<s%> but you are my <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4268>refuge.<s%>
Let my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with your <S%H8416>praise<s%> and with your <S%H8597>honor<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H7993>Cast<s%> me not off in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H2209>old<s%> age; <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me not when my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H3615>fails.<s%>
For my <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H559>speak<s%> against me; and they that lay <S%H8104>wait<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul<s%> take <S%H3289>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%>
<S%H559>Saying,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> him: <S%H7291>persecute<s%> and <S%H8610>take<s%> him; for there is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him.
O <S%H430>God,<s%> be not <S%H7368>far<s%> from me: O my <S%H430>God,<s%> make <S%H2439>haste<s%> for my <S%H5833>help.<s%>

Let them be <S%H954>confounded<s%> and <S%H3615>consumed<s%> that are <S%H7853>adversaries<s%> to my <S%H5315>soul;<s%> let them be <S%H5844>covered<s%> with <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and <S%H3639>dishonor<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>
But I will <S%H3176>hope<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> and will yet <S%H8416>praise<s%> you <S%H3254>more<s%> and <S%H3254>more.<s%>

My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H5608>show<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and your <S%H8668>salvation<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day;<s%> for I <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H5615>numbers<s%> thereof.
I will <S%H935>go<s%> in the <S%H1369>strength<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD:<s%> I will make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of your <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> even of your <S%H905>only.<s%>
O <S%H430>God,<s%> you have <S%H3925>taught<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth:<s%> and till <S%H5704>now<s%> <S%H2008><s%> have I <S%H5046>declared<s%> your <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> works.

Now <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5704>when<s%> I am <S%H2209>old<s%> and gray <S%H7872>headed,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me not; <S%H5704>until<s%> I have <S%H5046>showed<s%> your <S%H2220>strength<s%> to this <S%H1755>generation,<s%> and your <S%H1369>power<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> one that is to <S%H935>come.<s%>

Your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> also, O <S%H430>God,<s%> is <S%H5704>very<s%> <S%H4791>high,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> things: O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H3644>like<s%> to you!

You, <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H7200>showed<s%> me <S%H7229>great<s%> and <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H6869>troubles,<s%> shall <S%H2421>quicken<s%> me <S%H7725>again,<s%> and shall <S%H5927>bring<s%> me up <S%H7725>again<s%> from the <S%H8415>depths<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
You shall <S%H7235>increase<s%> my <S%H1420>greatness,<s%> and <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5437>side.<s%>

I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> you with the <S%H3627>psaltery,<s%> even your <S%H571>truth,<s%> O my <S%H430>God:<s%> to you will I <S%H2167>sing<s%> with the <S%H3658>harp,<s%> O you <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
My <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall greatly <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H2167>sing<s%> to you; and my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6299>redeemed.<s%>

My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H1897>talk<s%> of your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> long: for they are <S%H954>confounded,<s%> for they are <S%H2659>brought<s%> to <S%H2659>shame,<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>
